body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Experts Customer Support. My name is Noah Gonzales, and I will be assisting you today.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Amanda. To better assist you, may I have your phone number? Please spell out the digits.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's seven seven zero, five five five, one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you also provide me with your email address, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's a m a n d a dot c o l e m a n at e x a m p l e dot c o m.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that information, Amanda. Is there anything specific you need assistance with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I am experiencing an issue with the shipping of my car, and it's making me quite sad.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Amanda. Let's work together to get this resolved for you. Thank you for reaching out and sharing your concerns.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Amanda. Please feel free to reach out if you need any further assistance. Have a great day.
